p.k: Money Man / Vacation / The Park / Hurricane Hal The Bears help Chloe present her project for a college science contest. But Chloe's rival makes things difficult. / Nom Nom is ordered by his doctor to take a vacation. But he's paired with an unlikely travel buddy, Grizz. / The Bears spend a day at the park. Grizz works out. Panda attempts to sell his artwork. Ice Bear trains some kids. / A storm rolls in while the Bears are separated. Grizz looks after the Poppy Rangers. Panda is stuck with Charlie in his car. Chloe and Ice Bear are in the city seeking a ride home.
